name: Roped In
description:
2D Puzzle platformer utilising climbable projectiles  in addition to a rope arrow to navigate the levels. 

Year 1 Semester 2 Game Design Project; make a game with the constraints of no text, no dialogue and incorporate a dual-purpose mechanic.

Gameplay Features:
Rope Swinging
2 Different Projectiles
Moving Platforms
2 Enemy Types
